com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.proxying

Interface ProxyingEventBus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Consumer<Event>, EventBus, EventOutChannel

    public interface ProxyingEventBus
extends EventBus
    An EventBus that generates proxies for event-emitter interfaces.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <S> Optional<S> creating(Class<? extends S> stateClass, java.util.function.Consumer<ProxyingEventBus> busConsumer)
      Create a copy of this event bus that additionally sends events to the supplied state class on batch completion.
      default <L,R> void dispatch(Class<L> leftKlass, Class<R> rightKlass, java.util.function.BiConsumer<L,R> dispatchersConsumer)
      Create proxy instances of the supplied interfaces, and pass them to the supplied BiConsumer to emit events.
      default <T> void dispatch(Class<T> klass, java.util.function.Consumer<T> dispatcherConsumer)
      Create a proxy instance of the supplied interface, and pass it to the supplied Consumer to emit events.
      default <T> T getDispatcherFor(Class<T> klass)
      Get a proxy instance of the supplied interface that will create and complete a distinct batch containing a single event for each event-emitting method invocation.
      static ProxyingEventBus proxying(EventBus eventBus)
      Create a ProxyingEventBus that dispatches events via the supplied EventBus
      default <S> void updating(Class<? extends S> stateClass, S stateInstance, java.util.function.Consumer<ProxyingEventBus> busConsumer)
      Create a copy of this event bus that additionally sends events to the supplied state instance on batch completion.
      default void updating(Map<UUID,Object> stateObjectsById, java.util.function.Consumer<ProxyingEventBus> busConsumer)
      Create a copy of this event bus that additionally sends events to the supplied state objects (mapped by aggregate id) on batch completion.
      default <S> void updating(S stateInstance, java.util.function.Consumer<ProxyingEventBus> busConsumer)
      Create a copy of this event bus that additionally sends events to the supplied state instance on batch completion.
      default <S> void updating(UUID aggregateId, S stateInstance, java.util.function.Consumer<ProxyingEventBus> busConsumer)
      Create a copy of this event bus that additionally sends events intended for the supplied state object to that object on batch completion.

    • Method Detail

      • proxying

        static ProxyingEventBus proxying(EventBus eventBus)
        Create a ProxyingEventBus that dispatches events via the supplied EventBus
        Parameters:
        eventBus - The EventBus to dispatch events to.
        Returns:
        The constructed ProxyingEventBus.

      • dispatch

        default <T> void dispatch(Class<T> klass,
                          java.util.function.Consumer<T> dispatcherConsumer)
        Create a proxy instance of the supplied interface, and pass it to the supplied Consumer to emit events.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the proxy object.
        Parameters:
        klass - The interface to proxy.
        dispatcherConsumer - The Consumer that will use the proxy object to emit events.

      • dispatch

        default <L,R> void dispatch(Class<L> leftKlass,
                            Class<R> rightKlass,
                            java.util.function.BiConsumer<L,R> dispatchersConsumer)
        Create proxy instances of the supplied interfaces, and pass them to the supplied BiConsumer to emit events.
        Type Parameters:
        L - The type of the "left" proxy object.
        R - The type of the "right" proxy object.
        Parameters:
        leftKlass - The "left" interface to proxy.
        rightKlass - The "right" interface to proxy.
        dispatchersConsumer - The BiConsumer that will use the proxy objects to emit events.

      • getDispatcherFor

        default <T> T getDispatcherFor(Class<T> klass)
        Get a proxy instance of the supplied interface that will create and complete a distinct batch containing a single event for each event-emitting method invocation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the proxy object.
        Parameters:
        klass - The interface to proxy.
        Returns:
        The constructed proxy object.

      • updating

        default <S> void updating(S stateInstance,
                          java.util.function.Consumer<ProxyingEventBus> busConsumer)
        Create a copy of this event bus that additionally sends events to the supplied state instance on batch completion.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The type of the state instance.
        Parameters:
        stateInstance - The state instance to send events to.
        busConsumer - A Consumer that will use the subscribed bus.

      • updating

        Parameters:

        stateInstance - The state instance to send events to.

      • creating

        default <S> Optional<S> creating(Class<? extends S> stateClass,
                                 java.util.function.Consumer<ProxyingEventBus> busConsumer)
        Create a copy of this event bus that additionally sends events to the supplied state class on batch completion.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The type of the state instance.
        Parameters:
        stateClass - The class of the state instance.
        busConsumer - A Consumer that will use the subscribed bus.
        Returns:
        The constructed state, if present.

      • updating

        default void updating(Map<UUID,Object> stateObjectsById,
                      java.util.function.Consumer<ProxyingEventBus> busConsumer)
        Create a copy of this event bus that additionally sends events to the supplied state objects (mapped by aggregate id) on batch completion.
        Parameters:
        stateObjectsById - The state objects to send events to on batch completion.
        busConsumer - A Consumer that will use the subscribed bus.

      • updating

        default <S> void updating(UUID aggregateId,
                          S stateInstance,
                          java.util.function.Consumer<ProxyingEventBus> busConsumer)
        Create a copy of this event bus that additionally sends events intended for the supplied state object to that object on batch completion. Use this when you will generate additional events that should not be routed to the state object.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The type of the state instance.
        Parameters:
        aggregateId - The state object's aggregate id. Events not for this aggregate will not be routed to the object.
        stateInstance - The state instance to route events to.
        busConsumer - A Consumer that will use the subscribed bus.
